title: Who Works at the Bank? Modern Roles

sections.title: Traditional Banking Roles
sections.content:
People who work in the physical bank branch.

- **Banker**: Banquero
- **Teller / Cashier**: Cajero
- **Manager**: Gerente
- **Security Guard**: Guardia de seguridad
- **Accountant**: Contable

sections.title: Modern Banking Roles
sections.content:
Digital banking needs new experts.

- **App Developer**: Desarrollador de aplicaciones
- **Cybersecurity Expert**: Experto en ciberseguridad
- **Data Analyst**: Analista de datos
- **Online Assistant**: Asistente en línea

### Team Structure
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Bank Manager] --> B[Branch Staff]
    A --> C[Tech Team]
    C --> D[Developers]
    C --> E[Security Experts]
```

sections.title: Grammar: Wh-Questions
sections.content:
To get information, we use Wh- words.

- **Who**: Quién (e.g., *Who is the manager?*)
- **What**: Qué (e.g., *What is an app?*)
- **Where**: Dónde (e.g., *Where is the tech team?*)
- **When**: Cuándo (e.g., *When do they work?*)

**Structure:**
- **Wh- word + is + subject?**
- **Wh- word + do/does + subject + verb?**

objectives: Identify traditional and modern professional roles in banking
Use Wh- words to ask for information
Understand the tech roles in a digital bank
